string.value: You met another Mapler at the Energy Laboratory. Should you try starting a conversation?
You arrived at the Energy Laboratory but an Anti-Theft Laser is preventing your approach. There is a Teleport Device nearby which may allow you to pass through safely...
The Teleport Device has been turned on! All that is left is to retrieve a Crystanol Fragment and return to the Time Machine.
Okay, think. THINK. Others have made it past here, so there MUST be a way to power this thing. \r\nCan you try looking for a power device?
In the meantime, there's something I've got to think about. \r\nReturn as soon as you can.
What? Guess you ARE as useless as you look.
Already? How? \r\n#L0##bWasn't hard. The outlet was just covered in dirt, that's all.#l\n#k
I see. Why don't you go on ahead and grab some #b#t4001458##k. I'll wait here and er, think some more.\r\n#L0##bOkay... (People can be so strange.)#l\n#k
Are you talking to yourself? What are you saying!?
Hurry! Move quickly, before aliens appear!
The Teleport Device is still not working! Oh geez, I hope we're not stuck here FOREVER!
